alert.note: Alert for Bee; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:27AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Patricio, west central Refugio and southeastern Bee Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 926 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Berclair, or 10 miles east of Beeville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Refugio, Skidmore, St. Paul and Papalote. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 612 and 620. US Highway 183 near mile marker 668. US Highway 77 near mile marker 620. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
